UNTAG_DESCRIPTION: Use this command to remove a tag from your card. If you wish to delete an entire tag you can use the "Tagdelete" command instead
UT_EMPTY_COLLECTION: {{author}} You do not have any cards in your collection yet
INVALID_CODE: {{author}} That card code is either invalid or not in your collection
UNTAG_SUCCESSFUL: {{author}} Successfully removed the tag from your **{{cardName}}** card
MULTIPLE_UNTAG: {{author}} Successfully removed the tag from **{{count}}** cards
INVALID_CODE_MULTIPLE:
{{author}} The following card codes are either invalid or not in your collection:
{{invalidCodeList}}
